data.name: Sample - Datadog Cloud SIEM - 1.0.0
data.description: Sample playbooks for "Datadog Cloud SIEM" connector. If you are planning to use any of the sample playbooks in your environment, ensure that you clone those playbooks and move them to a different collection, since the sample playbook collection gets deleted during connector upgrade and delete.

workflows.name: Get Incident Details
workflows.description: Retrieves the incident details based on the incident ID that you have specified.

workflows.name: Get Attachments
workflows.description: Retrieves the detailed list of attachments based on the incident ID that you have specified.

workflows.name: Get Hosts
workflows.description: Retrieves detailed list of hosts for your organization based on the parameters that you have specified.

workflows.name: Update Incident
workflows.description: Update an incident based on the parameters that you have specified.

workflows.name: Get Event Details
workflows.description: Retrieves the event details based on the event ID that you have specified.

workflows.name: Search Events
workflows.description: Search and retrieve the detailed list of events based on the parameters that you have specified.

workflows.name: > Datadog > Fetch and Create
workflows.description: Fetch and Create Incidents from Datadog.

step_variables._configuration_schema:
[
  {
    "title":"Pull Sample Incidents in Past X Minutes",
    "name":"fetch_data_in_last_X_minutes",
    "type":"text",
    "tooltip":"Pull the incidents in the past X minutes. e.g. 14400 minutes are 10 days.",
    "required":true,
    "editable":true,
    "visible":true,
    "value":14400
  },
  {
          "title": "State",
          "name": "state",
          "type": "select",
          "description": "Specify the state of the incident to filter the results.",
          "tooltip": "Specify the state of the incident to filter the results.",
          "required": false,
          "visible": true,
          "editable": true,
          "options": [
            "Active",
            "Stable",
            "Resolved"
          ]
        },
        {
          "title": "Severity",
          "name": "severity",
          "type": "select",
          "description": "Specify the state of the incident to filter the results.",
          "tooltip": "Specify the state of the incident to filter the results.",
          "required": false,
          "visible": true,
          "editable": true,
          "options": [
            "SEV-1 (Critical)",
            "SEV-2 (High)",
            "SEV-3 (Moderate)",
            "SEV-4 (Low)",
            "SEV-5 (Minor)",
            "Unknown"
          ]
        },
        {
          "title": "Customer Impacted",
          "name": "customer_impacted",
          "type": "checkbox",
          "description": "Select the checkbox to specify whether the incident caused customer impact.",
          "tooltip": "Select the checkbox to specify whether the incident caused customer impact.",
          "required": false,
          "visible": true,
          "editable": true
        },
        {
          "title": "Detection Method",
          "name": "detection_method",
          "type": "select",
          "description": "Specify how the incident was detected.",
          "tooltip": "Specify how the incident was detected.",
          "required": false,
          "visible": true,
          "editable": true,
          "options": [
            "Customer",
            "Employee",
            "Monitor",
            "Other",
            "Unknown"
          ]
        },
        {
          "title": "Sort",
          "name": "sort",
          "type": "select",
          "description": "Specify the order in which incidents should be returned.",
          "tooltip": "Specify the order in which incidents should be returned.",
          "required": false,
          "visible": true,
          "editable": true,
          "options": [
            "Ascending",
            "Descending"
          ]
        },
        {
          "title": "Include",
          "name": "include",
          "type": "select",
          "description": "Specify which types of related objects should be included in the response.",
          "tooltip": "Specify which types of related objects should be included in the response.",
          "required": false,
          "visible": true,
          "editable": true,
          "options": [
            "Users",
            "Attachments"
          ]
        },
        {
          "title": "Offset",
          "name": "offset",
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "Specify the offset from which to retrieve the records.",
          "tooltip": "Specify the offset from which to retrieve the records.",
          "required": false,
          "visible": true,
          "editable": true
        },
        {
          "title": "Limit",
          "name": "limit",
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "Specify the number of records that the operation should fetch per page.",
          "tooltip": "Specify the number of records that the operation should fetch per page.",
          "required": false,
          "visible": true,
          "editable": true
        },
        {
          "title": "Fetch All Incidents",
          "name": "fetch_all_incidents",
          "type": "checkbox",
          "description": "Select the checkbox to fetch all incidents.",
          "tooltip": "Select the checkbox to fetch all incidents.",
          "required": false,
          "visible": true,
          "editable": true
        }
]

routes.name: Fetch Incidents with limit -> Return Sample Data
Is data only for mapping -> Copy of Fetch Incidents with limit
routes.label: No, For Ingestion

routes.name: Is data only for mapping -> Fetch Incidents with limit
routes.label: Yes, For Mapping
